duck: disconnection definition: to sever the connection of or between.
Disconnected (Beat Union album) - Disconnected is the debut album of the band Beat Union.
"Disconnected" (Shy Child song) - "Disconnected" is the lead single from New York Synthpop duo Shy Child's fourth studio album, Liquid Love.
Disconnection is the practice of shunning in Scientology.
"Disconnect" (Prison Break), an episode of the American television series Prison Break
Disconnect (2012 film), a film directed by Henry Alex Rubin

wiki.text:
'[[Disconnection]]' is the practice of shunning in Scientology.

'Disconnect' may refer to:

* ''Disconnect'' (album), a 2000 album by Iris
* "Disconnect" (Prison Break), an episode of the American television series
  Prison Break
* "Disconnect", a song by Rollins Band from [[Weight (album)|Weight]]
* "Disconnect", a song by Ima Robot from [[Monument to the Masses]]
* ''Disconnect'' (2012 film), a film directed by Henry Alex Rubin
* ''Disconnect'' (2013 film), a documentary film

'Disconnected' may refer to:
* ''Disconnected'' (Beat Union album)
* ''Disconnected'' (The Buzzhorn album), 2002
* ''Disconnected'' (Fates Warning album), 2000
* ''Disconnected'' (Funkstörung album), 2004
* ''Disconnected'' (Faust/Nurse with Wound album), 2007
* Disconnected, an album by Dry Cell
* Disconnected, an album by Stiv Bators
* "Disconnected" (Face to Face song), 1993
* "Disconnected" (Shy Child song)
* "Disconnected" (Keane song), 2012
* "Disconnected", a song by Idlewild from [[Warnings/Promises]]
* "Disconnected", a song by Queensryche from [[Promised Land (Queensrÿche
  album)|Promised Land]]
* "Disconnected", a song by Red Jumpsuit Apparatus from [[Ass
  Shaker/Justify/Face Down EP]]
* "Disconnected", a series of songs by Inspector K, featured in the dance game
  [[In the Groove (video game)#Song list|In the Groove]]
* "Disconnected", a song by Pegboard Nerds
